TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Tjalja’avus, title = Tjalja’avus, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tjalja’avus} }

S.FORM: Tjalja'avus Itiniay i Laiyi Cen no Pingtung ko Tjalja'avus a niyaro', 341 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,122 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 1,092 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 30 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan93%, Amis1%, Rukai1%, roma2%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Tjalja'avos Itiniay i Laiyi Cen no Pingtong ko Tjalja'avos a niyaro', 341 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,122 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 1,092 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 30 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan93%, Amis1%, Rokai1%, roma2%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
